Invocation: What other powers will we call upon?

elements: This rite recalls the loss of the Watchman, who walks the house has no walls. Light goes before him and shadow behind. He must not see you.

Invocation: What other powers will we call upon?

Subject: Will you or another give your blood?

Instrument: On what will blood be shed?

elements: This rite sets the blood afire, and fire is the lesion in the skin of the world. The subject rarely survives unharmed.
